SEARCH
Package calculator

Class AbstractCalculator

java.lang.Object
calculator.AbstractCalculator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Calculator
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleCalculator, SmartCalculator
public abstract class AbstractCalculator extends Object implements Calculator
Abstract base class for implementations of Calculator. This class contains all the method definitions that are common to the concrete implementations of the Calculator interface. A new implementation of the interface has the option of extending this class, or directly implementing all the methods.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractCalculator

      public AbstractCalculator(String inputString, int secondOperand, char operator, boolean hasComputationPerformed)
      Constructs an AbstractCalculator constructor with inputString, second operand, operator, and hasComputationPerformed.
      Parameters:
      inputString - the inputs that has been entered thus far.
      secondOperand - tracks the last operand used in computation before a new operator or operand is given.
      operator - tracks the last operator used in computation before a new operator or operand is given.
      hasComputationPerformed - indicating if the computation has performed on given input string or not.

      Throws:

      Description copied from interface: Calculator
